name: [GBA] Reimu and the Origin of the Purification Rod
name_original: [GBA] Reimu and the Origin of the Purification Rod
description:
A small puzzle RPG made during the 5th Touhou Game Jam. In a prequel retelling of sorts, our heroine Reimu seeks out the legendary Purification Rod. Trapped in an endless forest, she must navigate the trails of the forest to find the Rod as well as the exit, least she get trapped forever....

Code is open source on github-

https://github.com/FireFox2000000/GbaGameEngine/tree/touhou_fan_game_jam_5
